news.title: The Numbers Add Up
news.content: We aim to save 300 metric tonnes per year in landfill. We also hope you find something that saves you cash in your back pocket.
news.author: rowling

news.title: Give Gaia a Break
news.content: We currently use 24% more than the planet and biosphere can provide in a single year. At GreenCycle we aim to provide a network of people who can bring this quantity back to as low as possible, restoring Gaia in the process.
news.author: rowling

news.title: Search by useful categories
news.content: Use our easy to navigate categories above including furniture, phones/electrics, metals, training equipment,clothes/textiles and others.
news.author: rowling

news.title: Going Green Starts Local
news.content: The GreenCycle community currently stands at over 60 worldwide locations. Join today and add your junk
news.author: rowling

news.title: Powered by Google algorithms
news.content: Find the nearest phone, tablet, t-shirt, pedal bike or piece of furniture by using our locator algorithm as employed by Google maps.
news.author: rowling

news.title: Our Users Love us
news.content: We have over 3000 users that can take or provide second hand products off your hands.
news.author: rowling
